name: Order Sport
description:
a puzzle sports game of competitive ordering, all played with the mouse. instructions on the main game itself.

PLEASE NOTE! THERE ARE TWO ANNOYING BUGS LEFT IN THE GAME.....

Restarting and The best score counter unfortunately don't function as i ran out of time to bug fix it! but the main timer works so keep score from that and  closing the tab then restarting manually again should work ok, sorry!?! .  Happy order sporting!!
